thread.title: Great stay in between Central Park and Broadway.
thread.title_full: Great stay in between Central Park and Broadway. - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Julie C
title: Great stay in between Central Park and Broadway.
text: Wonderful location for visiting Central Park and heading to Times Square and Broadway shows. The check in and out was pleasant and easy. The bar staff was helpful and our dinner, filet and choice of wine was perfect.
